-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Avion"
(
    "idAvion" integer NOT NULL,
    modelo character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    peso integer,
    capacidad character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "numeroLicencia" integer,
    "idHangares" integer,
    CONSTRAINT "Aviones_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("idAvion")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Hangar"
(
    "idHangares" integer NOT NULL,
    capacidad character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    localizacion character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "Hangares_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("idHangares")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Piloto"
(
    "numeroLicencia" integer NOT NULL,
    restricciones character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    salario integer,
    turno character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "Piloto_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("numeroLicencia")
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Avion"
    ADD CONSTRAINT "Aviones_idHangares_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("idHangares")
    REFERENCES public."Hangar" ("idHangares") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Avion"
    ADD CONSTRAINT "Aviones_numeroLicencia_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("numeroLicencia")
    REFERENCES public."Piloto" ("numeroLicencia") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
